title: Mr.Time : Complication
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'Complication'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.*Tap : watch theme change
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'Complication'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.

*Tap : watch theme change
comments: Beautiful face with two annoying exceptions Beautiful watch face in both black and white backgrounds. My issue is with changing the background by tapping face. This should be done in a settings menu. Also there are no hour dashes in ambient mode. (My preference). Please fix in future versions.
Nice watch face but... Please make the option to have the face black or white an option behind the scenes, NOT a click of the face, this way there's no accidental clicks...
